articles.author: Anish Anand
articles.title: India improve attack but Australia remain too high a mountain to climb - ESPN India
articles.description: Another match and another loss to Australia for the Indian men's hockey team - their fourth straight in the five-match series.
articles.content:
Another match and another loss to Australia for the Indian men's hockey team.
Before the start of the five-match series in Australia, there was hope that Craig Fulton's India could make things very … [+4524 chars]
